research_municipality_step.notes: The City of Marion, TX operates as a Type A General Law Municipality with an elected mayor and five aldermen (council members). The current officials were identified from the Texas Municipal League directory and recent election results. Kerry Gutierrez holds the position of Mayor Pro Tem and Council Member Place 2. Other council members do not have specific place designations mentioned in the provided sources.

office.name: Alderperson - Mayor Pro Tempore - Council Member - Place 2
